price: Evlerinizde okunan Allah'ın âyetlerini ve hikmeti hatırlayın. Şüphesiz Allah, her şeyin iç yüzünü bilendir ve her şeyden haberi olandır.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِي بُيُوتِكُنَّ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur'na mā yut'lā fī buyūtikunna min āyāti al-lahi wal-ḥik'mati inna al-laha kāna laṭīfan khabīran
